## R Markdown
Distribution of marks for component 2
This section outlines the percentages assignment to each of the marking criteria per part of the assessment:
• Initial project scope: 20%
• Data loading, wrangling and pre-processing: 30%
• Methods, interpretation and criticality: 30%
• Visualisation proficiency and communication: 20%
Please note, poor academic practice or academic misconduct will be reported to the Module Convenor in the first instance who will follow the

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
